book.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
book.author: Yuval Noah Harari
book.description: Explores the history of humanity from our origins as hunter-gatherers to the modern world.

book.title: Unplug and Unwind: Mindful Ways to Rest, Relax, and Feel Renewed
book.author: Cico Books
book.description: Discover how better to meet the stress and demands of daily life with accessible and gratifying ways to decompress and live each day more fully.

book.title: Pocket Book of Knitting
book.author: Claire Gelder
book.description: From best-selling author and crafting queen Claire Gelder, this gorgeous mini guide is packed full of knitting know-how, practical illustrations and comes with four simple projects.

book.title: The Lean Startup
book.author: Eric Ries
book.description: A guide to developing businesses through rapid experimentation and iterative feedback.

book.title: Penulis Jalanan
book.author: Teme Abdullah
book.description: Penulis Jalanan membawa kita menyelami perjalanan menjadi dewasa secara spesifiknya kehidupan selepas fasa universiti, bekerja dan hidup berdikari yang berbeza. Tidak semudah dan seindah yang dibayangkan tetapi tetap bermakna jika melihat dari perspektif yang lebih luas.

book.title: A Short History of Nearly Everything
book.author: Bill Bryson
book.description: A witty and engaging exploration of the universe's history, from the Big Bang to the present day.

book.title: Surrounded by Idiots: The Four Types of Human Behaviour (or, How to Understand Those Who Cannot Be Understood)
book.author: Thomas Erikson
book.description: A collection of delicious and creative vegetarian recipes, replicating the flavors and textures of meat dishes.

book.title: Malaysian Maverick: Mahathir Mohamad in Turbulent Times
book.author: Barry Wain
book.description: The autobiography of Malaysia's longest-serving Prime Minister, Tun Mahathir Mohamad, detailing his life and political career.

book.title: Making Tiktok Videos
book.author: Will Eagle
book.description: Create videos using the tricks of TikTok stars! Making TikTok Videos reveals the secrets that TikTok celebs and influencers use to make the videos that everyoneâ€™s watching.

book.title: Kek 5 Bahan
book.author: Suwarsi M. Arukin
book.description: 40 aneka kek dan Bonus 10 Dessert.

book.title: A Game of Thrones
book.author: George R.R. Martin
book.description: A thrilling tale of power, betrayal, and magic in the land of Westeros.

book.title: Pride and Prejudice
book.author: Jane Austen
book.description: A witty social commentary following the lives of aristocratic families in England.

book.title: The Lord of the Rings
book.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
book.description: An epic high-fantasy adventure following a hobbit's quest to destroy the One Ring.

book.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
book.author: Douglas Adams
book.description: A humorous science fiction adventure following an Englishman and his alien companions through space.

book.title: Little Women
book.author: Louisa May Alcott
book.description: A coming-of-age story following the lives of four March sisters during the American Civil War.

book.title: And Then There Were None
book.author: Agatha Christie
book.description: Ten strangers are invited to a remote island, only to find themselves picked off one by one.

book.title: The Gift of Rain
book.author: Tan Twan Eng
book.description: A captivating historical novel set in colonial Malaya, following a young lawyer's journey of love, loss, and the complexities of cultural identity.

book.title: The Accidental Malay
book.author: Karina Bahrin
book.description: A controversial yet thought-provoking novel exploring the complexities of identity, race, and religion in modern-day Malaysia. Jasmine Leong, a driven Chinese businesswoman, discovers she's actually Malay by birth, upending her life and challenging her cultural assumptions.

book.title: Introvert
book.author: Abstrakim
book.description: Mereka kata, orang introvert selalunya perahsia dan suka memendam perasaan. Farady mengaku dia memang sukar untuk meluahkan apa yang dia rasa. Sejak kecil dia selalu merasa kesunyian dan sukar untuk mencari rakan yang boleh dia percayai.

book.title: Rojak: Bite-Sized Stories
book.author: Amir Muhammad
book.description: This is a collection of very short fictional stories. The taste can be sweet, juicy, spicy, tart, or crunchy! The flavours of Malaysia, in fact. So if this book could talk, it would say: "Bite Me.".
